title: Helium 10 Keyword Research Tutorial 2024 - Amazon KDP

tactics.name: Keyword Investment Analysis
tactics.description: Calculating ROI for keyword research software by comparing sales volume to subscription costs
source_quotes: I literally need to make 26 additional sales to make my money back on this investment

tactics.name: keyword_filtering
tactics.description: Use Helium 10 Magnet tool to identify related keywords with filters for search volume, competition, and keyword length.
steps: Input targeted keywords into Helium 10 Magnet
Apply filters like IQ score, word count, and competing products
caveats: Requires paid membership for full data access
source_quotes: put in your best... keyword... magnet will show you all related keywords

tactics.name: Filter by Search Volume and Competition
tactics.description: Use Helium 10 to filter keywords by search volume and competing products to identify less saturated, high-potential keywords.
steps: Apply search volume filter to prioritize commonly searched terms
Use competing products filter to eliminate overly saturated keywords
Compile remaining keywords into a spreadsheet for further analysis
caveats: Avoid misleading keywords that don't align with product content
source_quotes: use this competing products number here and I will generally go for nothing more than 5 000 competing products for a keyword

tactics.name: reverse_product_lookup
tactics.description: Use Cerebro to analyze competing books' keywords and filter for high-performing, relevant terms
steps: Search Amazon for main keyword (e.g., 'mandala coloring book for adults')
Run reverse product lookup in Cerebro
Filter keywords by search volume and competition
caveats: May miss niche long-tail keywords without additional filtering
source_quotes: a good performing book generally I will say anything under 50 000 in the UK is it generally a good performing book

heuristics.name: Sales Volume Benchmark
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, boost keyword optimization efforts
source_quotes: I need to sell less than one book per day extra from Helium 10 to make this a good return

heuristics.name: short_tail_filter
heuristics.condition: If keyword contains fewer than 3 words, prioritize for higher search volume
source_quotes: short tail keyword... maximum of keywords... one word in the phrase

heuristics.name: Prioritize Low Competition Keywords
heuristics.condition: If competing products are below 5,000, prioritize the keyword
source_quotes: press apply filter here and you simply filtered down quite a few keywords here

heuristics.name: filter_by_competition
heuristics.condition: If competition threshold is below 5,000, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: press apply filters and you can see we've lost almost half of these keywords which is still good news for us

claims.statement: Paid keyword research tools like Helium 10 provide significantly better keyword data than free alternatives
source_quotes: Free versions just are nowhere near as good as the paid versions

claims.statement: Selling 7,500 units in a single month is achievable with effective keyword research.
source_quotes: sold seven and a half thousand units in a single month

claims.statement: Keywords with high search volume and low competition are ideal for Amazon KDP listings
source_quotes: generally anything over 500 per month in my opinion is a decent search volume

claims.statement: Cerebro is the best reverse product lookup tool for extracting accurate, high-performing keywords
source_quotes: cerebro is by far the best in terms of you get so many more keywords for your searches

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with unique constraints
source_quotes: I get three dollars per sale I literally only need to make 26 additional sales

niche_patterns.description: Combine niche-specific keywords with functional benefits to capture search intent
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Aligns with buyer intent for targeted audience segments
source_quotes: mandala coloring book for adults... related keywords
